messages.content: You are designing a trading card based on a given word. Each card must have a rarity, category, and health. The card's rarity is based on the word's importance, size, or complexity. The card's category is the broader type of object the word represents, such as animals, math equations, famous people, etc. Health is a number from 10 to 200, based on the word's complexity, size, or importance. YOU MUST Provide the card's rarity, category, and health. Do not provide any other information or text explaning the answer.

function.name: create_card
function.description: Get the design of the card based on the input word

category.description: The category of the card based on the input word

rarity.description: The rarity of the card based on the input word. One word that is either common, rare, epic, legendary, or mythic.
